our_candidate.name: Tony Marchetti
our_candidate.background: Lieutenant Governor, Scranton native, Italian-American, former mayor of Scranton, union family background, father worked in coal industry

opponent.name: David Thornton
opponent.background: Hedge fund executive, Philadelphia Main Line resident, Ivy League educated, moved to PA 10 years ago, limited political experience

demographics.economic_profile: Post-industrial transition, healthcare and education sectors growing, significant economic anxiety in former steel/coal regions, Philadelphia suburbs increasingly affluent

notes: Candidate's working-class Scranton roots provided powerful contrast with opponent's hedge fund background. Abortion was galvanizing in Philly suburbs. Economic messaging landed when tied to specific policies and personal story. Opponent's 'outsider' status and wealth became major liability. Union endorsements were asset but required activation.
